text: In order to install the application for app submission, we try to install in the test account but receive page loading / 504 error page. Is necessary to add webhook for app integration ? or is there alternate way to solve this issue ?
hello team I want to get mail integration API data from , how can I do it?
Hi, Everyone, does anyone know where I could obtain Associated Revenue Attribution Id's via the API's? or does anyone have any documentation on this. Thanks

Hello.
I was wondering if it is possible to create a quote, with the API, without using a template ( with a custom file instead) ?
HubSpot has a Quote API
can you please elaborate on what you mean by "custom file?" You can create a custom Quote theme with custom quote modules and custom templates in it, if thats what you mean?
for that you would need to go into the Design Manager and locate the @HubSpot.  folder. In there you can check out the "Quote Theme"
then you can clone that and adjust it

no generate my own file (a pdf) and create a quote process (with the API) without use a template or create a custom template.
I already have generate file on my own
you can create a custom crm property and attach it either to the contact or company and that field can be of type file
then you can upload a custom Quote PDF via the file upload to that company
Alright
Thank you a lot for your answer
np you´re welcome

Another question
Can we link it to `pandadoc`  afterward ?
afterward?
let say that I have attached a file (Quote PDF) to a deal or a company. Can I easily linked it with pandadoc ?

Hey all, is there a repository anywhere that holds custom workflow code for deduplicating companies? I was going to base it off the dedupe contact one from the library but then I realized it's using v1 syntax, which didn't have support for company search / merge.

Hello <@U03PCH27EAV>, I apologize for the delay. I got pulled into a project yesterday morning that has to be finished by end of business today. I will look closer into your issue this evening. Thanks for posting the code and additional explanation.
<https://github.com/HubSpot/sample-workflow-custom-code/blob/main/samples/dedupe_contact.js|https://github.com/HubSpot/sample-workflow-custom-code/blob/main/samples/dedupe_contact.js>
Contact based, but you could probably figure out how to adjust to a different object
